## ğŸ“‹ About CoachGuru

**CoachGuru** is a comprehensive mobile application designed for professional football coaches to manage their teams, track player performance, analyze tactics, and record match statistics. Built with Flutter for cross-platform compatibility, CoachGuru helps coaches stay organized and make data-driven coaching decisions.

### ğŸ¯ Key Features

- ğŸ‘¥ **Player Management** - Track profiles, statistics, and attendance
- âš½ **Match History** - Record results, goals, and detailed statistics
- ğŸ“ **Training Notes** - Manage sessions and track player progress
- ğŸ” **Scouting Reports** - Create comprehensive player assessments
- ğŸ¯ **Tactic Board** - Design formations and visualize strategies
- ğŸ“¹ **Video Analysis** - Import and analyze gameplay (Coming Soon)

### ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/GuruGroup-de/coachguru-app.git
cd coachguru-app

# Install dependencies
flutter pub get

# Run the app
flutter run
```
